name: MetalTyrannomon
description: MetalTyrannomon is a bipedal Tyrannosaurus rex -like Digimon with blue eyes, three fingers on each hand, three toes on each foot, and a pair of teeth so large they pop out of the mouth. It has pallid grey skin on its body and black stripes on its head, arms, and legs. The tail appears to have wires attached to it, and it has black torn spikes on its back. MetalTyrannomon has black claws on its fingers and dark grey plating on its knees and feet, wears metal ornaments on its hands, has metal plating on its nose and lower jaw, and circuits on its chest. Its design appears to be based on the fictional MechaGodzilla .
